DataElement.preferredName: Second Relapse Progressive Disease Previously Not Reported Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text indicator to signify whether a patient has developed a SECOND porgression or relapse hat has not been reported.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Second Relapse Progressive Disease Previously Not Reported
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: First documentation of a progression or relapse of the disease/condition under investigation._Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude._The return of signs and symptoms of cancer after a period of improvement._A disease process that is increasing in scope or severity._A disease process that is increasing in scope or severity._A disease process that is increasing in scope or severity._Occurring prior to something else._Report; a short account._The non-affirmative response to a question.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude.:The return of signs and symptoms of cancer after a period of improvement.:Cancer that is increasing in scope or severity.

Concepts.definition: Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude.
The return of signs and symptoms of cancer after a period of improvement.
A clinical, pathologic, and/or molecular finding indicating that the course of a disease is worsening in terms of extent or severity.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring prior to something else.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Report; a short account.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.
A short textual account; having provided a short account.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
